rooms.description: Spacious living area with open layout and natural light.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room.
Fully equipped luxury kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and ample natural light.
Luxury bedroom featuring expansive windows and an attached balcony.
Luxury bedroom with a private balcony and access to the library corridor.
Primary master bedroom with an extensive balcony offering panoramic views.
Dedicated library area designed for reading and quiet reflection.
